title: If you come up with excuses why you can't win, just remember this girl is a one armed weightlifter
body:
http://49.media.tumblr.com/11257c1ce1b19485a41f9e1616c9725c/tumblr_o1waaya1ot1s83lk7o1_250.gif
Krystal Cantu lifts more with one arm then I can using both arms and leverage...

replies.body:
I will now send this to anyone who tries surrender in ranked and convince them there is still a chance to win.

But I am still blocking them afterwards. I hate people who surrender.

I just live by the motto from Galaxy Quest
http://i1.wp.com/bitcast-a-sm.bitgravity.com/slashfilm/wp/wp-content/images/Never-give-up-never-surrender.gif
I logged in to play league of legends, not ff at 20.

I only surrender when a score is something really (forgive the word please) stupid like 0-25 with 4 towers and an inhib down at 12 minutes. Otherwise I keep trying. Usually. >.> I still hate all Fizz players ever.

I once won with a 1/11 yasuo who fed an enemy Fizz,

After that, I think anything is possible.
You could've just say, _"a Yasuo who lost lane"_.
But then we wouldn't learn of the _fed Fizz_.

Fizz is indeed frustrating to play aganist, but I'd rather face fed Fizz, than say, fed Diana.
And she gets fed off Yasuo just as easily.

In any case saying "Yasuo lost lane" implies his opponent is fed and pretty much everybody who's fed beyond all recognition is a problem.

It doesn't really say how fed they were though. There's a difference between 11/0 and 4/0. You can actually lose lane without dying too. And if he hadn't mentioned Fizz, those 11 deaths could have been assumed to have been split across the enemy team which might not have been as bad.
I once lost as a fizz with 30 kills. I cried that day.
i once lost as a vayne with like 30 kills and a full sword of the occult.
I once won a 3 V 5
I always click yes. Even, esoecially, if we are winning.

I was going to make a joke about one-armed weightlifting, but that girl already makes me look like a joke.

*whistles*
THIS

So one example of a person doing something makes all the "excuses" invalid.. and means you should work harder.

Just note that for every Krystal Cantu, there are a ton of people who've failed despite all their efforts(not everyone is Steve Jobs, Walt Disney, etc. you name it)
I think they know this but OP was trying to be profound. meh
I do not get the point

She's overcome a 50% discrepancy in capability to do what most people in the world cannot do with said advantage. So operating at 50% of what she can, she is doing better than us. So never surrender.

Edit: Before my group of people who enjoy downvoting me find this post, I respect this person. I can't lift a weight at a 10th of that >.> I'm a potato... with straw arms...
Yeah but I bet she can't beat me in a 1v1 fucking noob

I'm impressed. It is damn hard to close grip snatch, let alone close grip snatch with one arm. Props to her.

EDIT:
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/55/11/88/551188f8bdc81b900420f1d8d9cb6bcc.jpg

I hate when people give up in the first 15 minutes of the game, so much can be done to come back and win.

People don't understand how to stop the bleeding.
people really don't understand how to stop the bleeding. that is why they give up. They need to be willing to learn and have someone teach them how to. One of those things is usually lacking.
Imagine what that's like on her back though :/
If I wanted a guaranteed win, I would of picked Kayle and only used my nose to right and left click.
She has a good body
Yeah but she doesnt have 3 other guys trying to sweep her legs, and 1 laughing and scream report.
If you come up with excuses why you can't win, just remember majority of thr players play with <30 fps and >150 ping.

I play with, on average, 90 fps and 30 ping, but every two or so games my ping randomly spikes to 1000-6000 for half the game.
I don't know why.

play when no one else is using ur internet

when my family watches youtube my ping goes up to over 9000

HA
like at least one other person in my family isn't on the internet at all times
good one

~~I'm sorry~~

ITS OVER NINE THOUSAND!
Are you on wifi or ethernet?

WiFi.
Pretty sure its that my family uses too much bandwidth than we pay for overall, so it randomly lags.

1. how old is your router?
2. What floor is your router on and what floor do you play on?
3. How far away from the router are you?
4. Do you use a desktop or laptop and can you connect ethernet to it?

1. I think like a year
2. We only have one floor besides the attic and basement, so, first.
3. Probably between 20-30 feet.
4. A desktop and we can connect ethernet if we get some kind of extension cord.
Yeah but imagine if she had 2 people pulling the weight and 1 person throwing eggs at her while she does it and one person crying in the corner yelling at the wall to report everyone else.
i sense Imgurian
Inb4 people start equating individuals to teams >.>
still doesn't have anything to do with gaming cuz gaming isn't weight lifting so it's irrelevant
Yeah, let's see her do that with 4 other idiots trolling her.
